title: Leesburg, Georgia.  Arrested for demonstrating in Americus, teenage girls are kept in a stockade in the countryside.
marks: \"#11\", in pencil, on back; \"Printer/Kelton/BLEAK B \"Danny Lyon\", in pencil, on back
description: group of teenage girls standing, with one girl seated at right, in a small concrete-walled room with barred windows and debris on floor
creditline: The Alfred and Ingrid Lenz Harrison Fund
